title: Olay Regenerist Deep Hydration Regenerating Cream
review_summary: Customer reviews are mixed regarding the Olay Regenerist cream. Some customers love the product's texture, scent, and hydrating properties, stating it leaves their skin feeling soft and smooth. They particularly praise its effectiveness in combating dryness and age-related concerns. However, others express disappointment with the recent formula change, finding it leaves a greasy film, absorbs poorly, and lacks the previous moisturizing benefits. Some even find the scent overpowering compared to the original.

review_summary: Customers are divided on the sequel to Big Fat Greek Wedding.  Some find the acting, storyline, and humor forced and disappointing compared to the original. Others think it's just as good, if not better, praising the lighthearted tone, excellent acting, and family-friendly entertainment.  Many  love the movie and plan to watch it repeatedly, suggesting a third installment featuring the daughter's wedding.  Overall, it seems viewers either love it or dislike it, with few falling in between.

title: Head & Shoulders Dry Scalp Care Conditioner
review_summary: Customers express mixed reviews about this conditioner. Some found it too heavy, leading to greasy buildup and an unpleasant residue, especially for fine hair types.  They also mentioned it didn't effectively remove product buildup and  left their hair feeling weighed down.  However, others with coarser hair or dry scalp appreciated its moisturizing properties, finding it helped with dryness, itchiness, and dandruff.  They praised the silky feel and shine it provided.

title: The Foodsaver174 10 Cup Fresh Container - Fac10-000
review_summary: Customer reviews are mixed for these FoodSaver containers. While many appreciate the stackable design, square shape, and freezer and dishwasher safety, some find the sealing process to be slow and unreliable.  Several reviewers report that the containers don't hold a seal properly, leading to wasted food.  Others have experienced issues with the lids leaking or cracking, despite being advertised as crack-resistant.  However, many customers love the containers for extending the freshness of their food and find them to be a worthwhile investment.

title: Pantene Airspray Hairspray - 7 Oz
review_summary: Customer reviews for this hairspray are mixed. While some praise its light hold, pleasant scent, and alcohol-free formula, others find it lacking in staying power, particularly for humid conditions or longer days.  Some describe it as sticky or leaving hair feeling dull, while others appreciate its non-sticky texture and ability to tame flyaways.  Overall, it seems to work well for those seeking a light hold but may not be suitable for those needing  stronger hold.
